flags.title: Missing evaluation metrics
flags.excerpt: Automated Irrigation Optimization for Smallholder Farms Smallholder farmers in the Sahel face water shortages.
flags.explanation: No clear evaluation, metrics, or baseline described. Define measurable success criteria (metric, baseline, timeframe).
flags.suggestion: Add explicit evaluation metrics: e.g., "increase yield by 10% within 12 months measured by randomized field trials against baseline."

flags.title: Potential personal / sensitive data collection
flags.excerpt: We will survey farmers about practices and incomes.
flags.explanation: Possible issue: Potential personal / sensitive data collection. See excerpt.
flags.suggestion: If collecting personal data, add consent procedures, anonymization, and data storage/retention details.

flags.title: Vague budget phrases
flags.excerpt: Budget includes hardware, travel, and miscellaneous costs.
flags.explanation: Possible issue: Vague budget phrases. See excerpt.
flags.suggestion: Replace vague phrases with line items: unit cost, quantity, justification for each cost.

flags.title: Impact statement too short or generic
flags.excerpt: The project will improve food security and reduce water use.
flags.explanation: Possible issue: Impact statement too short or generic. See excerpt.
flags.suggestion: Expand the impact statement with concrete beneficiaries and measurable outcomes.

strengths.title: Clear societal impact
strengths.excerpt: The project will improve food security and reduce water use.
strengths.note: Impact sentence is specific and relevant.
